functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

msg.content: How many employees did the Big Tech company with the most employees have in 2022?
How many employees did the Big Tech company with the most employees have in 2022?

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Please provide me with the list of Big Tech companies and their number of employees in 2022 so I can determine which company had the most employees."}

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.

msg.content:
I'm sorry, but I couldn't find a specific list of Big Tech companies and their number of employees in 2022. However, some of the largest Big Tech companies by number of employees include:

1. Amazon - Approximately 1.3 million employees worldwide
2. Alphabet (Google) - Approximately 150,000 employees worldwide
3. Microsoft - Approximately 181,000 employees worldwide
4. Apple - Approximately 154,000 employees worldwide
5. Facebook (Meta) - Approximately 70,000 employees worldwide

Based on these numbers, Amazon had the most employees among the Big Tech companies in 2022.
